author: jonathan
msg: Allow command line utilities to require a given SASL mechanism.
Useful if the client's most secure mechanism is suspect, e.g. if Kerberos configuration problems may exist.
Also useful in a variety of test scenarios.

author: samisa
msg: Fixed the problem of supporting Tokens not encrypted when protection order is sign before encrypting - RAMPART-288

author: eevans
msg: rat-exclude rpm files from updated location

author: ckoppelt
msg: removed couchdb adapter from build files to get rid of the additional maven repo; updated some dependencies
